rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0010
rows.name: So, before the White Whale crashed,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0015
rows.name: a buncha Ghosts got me cornered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0020
rows.name: I was cut off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0030
rows.name: And just as my goose seemed cooked...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0040
rows.name: something opened up in front of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0050
rows.name: And also, I felt this huge pull at the same time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0060
rows.name: My body, inside the Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0065
rows.name: We were being sucked right in through the opening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0070
rows.name: Beyond that was a sight to behold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0080
rows.name: If space could have edges,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0085
rows.name: that was a place where you could see them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0090
rows.name: Thinking about it now—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0100
rows.name: and to get a little technical—it was a nexus of parallel universes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0110
rows.name: It was like...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0120
rows.name: the backstage of space, the border town of all universes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0130
rows.name: You might call it a "rift between worlds."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0140
rows.name: Light-years beyond the realm of human science...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0150
rows.name:
But strangely, most of the Ares's features
kept functioning as normal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0160
rows.name:
Sure, the sensor suite adapted for human tech
kept throwing errors...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0170
rows.name:
but the main transceiver never stopped logging
huge quantities of some kinda data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0180
rows.name: And you might think I dreamed all this up, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0190
rows.name: somehow, I could understand what that data was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0200
rows.name: Not logically. Intuitively.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0210
rows.name: You ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0220
rows.name: Well, what came flooding into me and the Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0230
rows.name:
was the consciousness of all living things,
across all universes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0240
rows.name: Instinctively,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0250
rows.name: I stopped myself from trying to perceive them one by one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0260
rows.name: The human brain isn't built to handle something like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0270
rows.name: I could tell in an instant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0280
rows.name:
Think I got that one from an old sci-fi flick,
but I'd say it was the right call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0290
rows.name: Now,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0300
rows.name: the Ares was a step ahead of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0310
rows.name: It sifted through that huge torrent of data,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0320
rows.name:
and presented me with the information
I most wanted in that moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0330
rows.name: Heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0340
rows.name:
How to escape the world of the Rift
and get back to this one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0350
rows.name:
The Ares was kind enough to show me
the way back home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0360
rows.name: It's thanks to its help that I came back at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0370
rows.name: Well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0380
rows.name:
The universe Earth was a part of was destroyed.
This one with Mira is a completely different one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0390
rows.name: So maybe "back" is the wrong word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0400
rows.name: Sounds like quite the trip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0410
rows.name:
So that's your plan for us to leave this universe?
You're proposing we use the Ares to make our escape?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0420
rows.name: Well...more or less...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0430
rows.name: But...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0440
rows.name: I don't really understand EXACTLY how I got here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0450
rows.name: One slip-up, and I'd be washed away in that stream.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0460
rows.name: I might never have been able to escape it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0470
rows.name: That world...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0480
rows.name: It's a mind-prison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0490
rows.name: ...A prison?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0510
rows.name: Void, see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0520
rows.name: I think he was held there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0525
rows.name: His consciousness, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0530
rows.name:
You told me about the Vita.
How it was a vessel to facilitate Void's coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0540
rows.name:
I guess what it did was channel his soul in some
shape or form, freeing him of his shackles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0550
rows.name: What does that mean, though?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0560
rows.name:
Now hold on a sec...
That's like how our mims work...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0580
rows.name: No way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0590
rows.name: All the loose threads...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0600
rows.name: seem to be coming together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0610
rows.name: Perhaps...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0620
rows.name:
Perhaps Void escaped from his cell by tracking
the Ares as it left the rift between worlds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0630
rows.name: It would explain the impeccable timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0640
rows.name: And here's the kicker...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0645
rows.name:
The thing that's in the Vita?
It's not just his mind—it's his body too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0650
rows.name:
When the Ares first appeared in this world,
it was shortly before we encountered you, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0660
rows.name: Then the Ghosts' appearance, and the de-mat events...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0670
rows.name: It's possible that it caused both of them to manifest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0680
rows.name: Wait, wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0690
rows.name: I see you trying to connect all the dots.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0695
rows.name: Don'tcha think you're jumping the gun?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0700
rows.name: Maybe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0710
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0720
rows.name:
When Void showed up and
attacked my world to claim the Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0730
rows.name:
Think about it.
That was exactly when the Ghosts appeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0750
rows.name: What are we thinking then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0760
rows.name: Cause and effect, or?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0770
rows.name: Void said he brought worlds into "concord"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0780
rows.name: ...Ahh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0790
rows.name: I feel like I'm starting to get the picture here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0800
rows.name: Must be urgent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0810
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0820
rows.name:
We need you in Oblivia.
Hoping you could track down a Ma-non engineer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0830
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0840
rows.name: Let's hear the details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0850
rows.name:
Here you go: the guy is in charge of
the jump drive design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0860
rows.name:
Apparently he had a part in mind for the crux,
but it was sitting in a Ganglion stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0870
rows.name: So we had him get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0880
rows.name: That's a bold move, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0890
rows.name: What can I say? These are desperate times, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0900
rows.name: We did assign an escort,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0910
rows.name: but then Ganglion found 'em, and we...lost contact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0920
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0930
rows.name: That's enough to go on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0940
rows.name: We'll head for Oblivia ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0950
rows.name: Good hunting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32060100_MSG0960
rows.name: Let's move.[ST:wait ]
